collection:
This Privacy Policy document
contains types of information that is collected and recorded by RepeatNoMore
and how we use it.

Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) legal basis for
collecting and using the personal information described in this Privacy Policy
depends on the Personal Information we collect and the specific context in
which we collect the information:

  * Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) needs to perform a contract with you
  * You have given Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) permission to do so
  * Processing your personal information is in Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) legitimate interests
  * Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) needs to comply with the law

Kios Tech International Limited (HK) and Kios Tech Inc. (US) will retain your
personal information only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out
in this Privacy Policy.

The information collected by log files include
internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider
(ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of
clicks.
They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs.

RepeatNoMore does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information
from children under the age of 13.

## Online Privacy Policy Only

Our Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for
visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared
and/or collect in RepeatNoMore.

This policy is not applicable to any
information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
